sections.headline: UNLEASH YOUR INNER PULSE – TRANSFORM YOUR BODY WITH IRONPULSE FITNESS!
sections.subtext: Elevate your strength, ignite your energy, and redefine your limits. Our cutting-edge gym is built for those who dare to push beyond.

features.title: 24/7 Unlimited Access
features.description: Work out whenever inspiration strikes—day or night. Our state-of-the-art facilities are always open for you.

features.title: Certified Personal Trainers
features.description: World-class coaches dedicated to your transformation. Get tailored plans for explosive strength and conditioning.

features.title: Dedicated Strength & Cardio Zones
features.description: Push iron or cardio, all under one roof. High-tech zones designed for maximum performance.

features.title: Intense Group HIIT Classes
features.description: Sweat, burn, and crush your goals in our high-energy HIIT sessions led by expert trainers.

features.title: Nutrition & Supplements Guidance
features.description: Fuel like a champion with expert-approved dietary and supplement advice to accelerate your results.

features.title: Premium Locker Rooms & Amenities
features.description: Luxury showers, private cabins, and premium relaxation spaces to make your gym journey seamless.

pricingOptions.name: Basic Plan
pricingOptions.description: Gym access only. Perfect for those who prefer self-driven training in a top-tier facility.

pricingOptions.name: Pro Plan
pricingOptions.description: Gym + group classes. Ideal for high-energy individuals seeking discipline, motivation, and results.

pricingOptions.name: Elite Plan
pricingOptions.description: All Access + personal trainer. Unlimited potential with a coach guiding your every step toward greatness.

testimonials.name: Rajesh Singh
testimonials.review: "Gympulse transformed my approach to fitness. The trainers pushed me beyond my limits, and I’ve never felt this strong!"

testimonials.name: Priya Desai
testimonials.review: "The group HIIT classes are a game-changer. I lost 12 kg in 3 months without feeling deprived—just energized!"

testimonials.name: Avinash Patel
testimonials.review: "From nutrition guidance to elite training, Gympulse’s holistic approach delivered results I didn’t know were possible. Worth every penny!"
